name: Amazing Ghostrunner Girl
description:
Take the journey through the graveyard with the Amazing Ghostrunner Girl. Your mission: Stay alive.

In Amazing Ghostrunner Girl you play a girl who tries to get in one piece through a graveyard of obstacles.

Play this scary, horror game and see how far into the graveyard you are able to get.

No ads and no in-app purchases. You buy the game, you own it.
